name: ClickCells: Winter Lady
description:
Erotic casual puzzle!
The player's goal to keep the blue block on the platform for 3 seconds in order to pass the level.
As a reward you get pictures of a beautiful girl!

This game has images of a naked girl. The game is for people over 18 years old!

Also by numerous requests in the game appeared "administrator mode".

Administrator mode

Press the F button while at the art or puzzle level and you will immediately open the entire block of five puzzles and get the corresponding achievements.

There's a game waiting for you

  • Interesting puzzles
  • Art from LeArtNi
  • Nice music from Trauerbaum
  • Beautiful achievements

Powered by Clickteam Fusion 2.5
